data.message: Coca-cola please make sure your plastic bottles are fully recyclable, as our beaches are covered with them, (please help) this would be good for your next advertisement!, kind regards andy

replies.message: Hi Andy, thanks for getting in touch. We’d hate to see any of our bottles or cans ending up where they shouldn’t and want as many of them as possible to be recycled so that we can use them to make into new bottles and cans again. We’re also proud to say that all of our bottles and cans in Great Britain are 100% recyclable and have been since 2012. This means that all our drinks packaging can be recycled at home or when you’re out and about. However, we understand there is always more that can be done and we’ve embarked on a major review of our sustainable packaging strategy.  To keep up to date with all of our future sustainability announcements please visit www.coca-cola.co.uk/sustainability-section
